record.title: APPOINTMENT OF CONFEREES--H.R. 2206
record.chair: The Chair, as to H.R. 2206, appoints Mr. Byrd, Mr. Inouye, Mr. Reid, Mr. Cochran, and Mr. McConnell conferees on the part of the Senate.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
